projects.name: MindWell
projects.description: MindWell is a mental health care platform designed to provide easy access to high-quality and affordable mental health services across South Africa. The platform is built using a variety of cutting-edge technologies, including Vue.js, Node.js, MySQL, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Majestic Scent
projects.description: Majestic Scent Perfume Company is an ecommerce platform that provides a wide selection of high-quality fragrances,. The platform is built using the latest web technologies, including Vue.js, Node.js, MySQL, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, and Bootstrap, to provide an intuitive and responsive user experience.

projects.name: E-cormmece
projects.description: Niki's Flex Fit Gym Wear is an ecommerce platform that offers high-quality and stylish workout clothing and accessories for women. Developed using cutting-edge web technologies, including Vue.js, Node.js, MySQL, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, and Bootstrap, the site provides a seamless and responsive shopping experience for customers.

projects.name: Swegga-project
projects.description: Swegga is a dynamic and interactive website that showcases the latest in fashion, music, and lifestyle trends. Designed using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, the site provides visitors with an engaging and visually appealing user experience.

projects.name: Minimum And Maximum
projects.description: This Minimum and Maximum Calculator is a web application that allows users to quickly and easily determine the minimum and maximum values of a set of numbers. Developed using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, the calculator provides a simple and efficient way to solve common math problems.

projects.name: BMI-Calculator
projects.description: This BMI Calculator is a user-friendly web application that allows individuals to determine their Body Mass Index (BMI) based on their height and weight. Developed using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, the calculator offers a simple and convenient way to assess overall health and fitness.

projects.name: Temperature Convertor
projects.description: This Temperature Converter is a simple yet effective web application that allows users to convert between Fahrenheit, Celsius, and Kelvin temperatures. Developed using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, the converter features a user-friendly interface that makes temperature conversion easy and intuitive.

projects.name: Interest Amount Task
projects.description: This Interest Amount Calculator is a web application that allows users to easily calculate the amount of interest that will be accrued on a loan or investment. Developed using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, the calculator provides a user-friendly interface that makes calculating interest simple and straightforward.

projects.name: AddUp Calculator
projects.description: This Add Up Calculator is a web application that provides users with a quick and easy way to add up multiple numbers. Developed using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, the calculator offers a simple and user-friendly interface that makes adding up numbers a breeze.

education.description: I did my grade in this school.Had to change schools since I didn't want to do business studies.
My high school years.  Completed my matric with a bachelor's degree.
My university journey. I did my Psychology degree for 3 years and graduted in early 2024.
My first ever coding school.  This is the school where I learnt coding for the very first time.

testimonials.name: Kayden Hendricks
testimonials.message: Nikilitha's innovative approach to solving problems is commendable. I had the pleasure of working with Nikilitha on several web development projects, and her contributions were invaluable. Her dedication, creativity, and problem-solving skills helped us to create high-quality. Nikilitha's ability to work collaboratively and I would recommend her to any team looking for a skilled and reliable web developer.

testimonials.name: Caitlin Dalwai
testimonials.message: Having worked closely with Niki at Life Choices Academy, I wholeheartedly recommend her for any role within your esteemed tech company. Niki possesses an exceptional blend of technical expertise, innovative thinking, and a strong work ethic that consistently delivers outstanding results.Her ability to grasp complex technical concepts swiftly and apply them effectively in practical scenarios is truly impressive.

testimonials.name: Masoodah Geoerge
testimonials.message: It's always a pleasure to work with Nikilitha. Her enthusiastic character uplifts the room 100% of the time.  Her unwavering determination is something I deeply admire. Her resilience in the face of challenges is nothing short of awe-inspiring.  Nikilitha's positive attitude made her a valuable asset to our team. I would highly recommend her to anyone seeking a hardworking web developer.

testimonials.name: Nazneen Abrahams
testimonials.message: Nikilitha's kindness knows no bounds, and it's truly inspiring. Her constant encouragement is a priceless gift to those around you.She approaches every project with creativity, professionalism, and a strong commitment to meeting client needs. Her ability to quickly adapt to changing requirements, and her attention to detail are truly impressive. I enjoyed working with her and believe she would be an asset to any team.

testimonials.name: Matthew Dean Brown
testimonials.message: Nikilitha brings positivity to the workplace. Even during tough times, she maintains an optimistic outlook, motivating others and creating a pleasant atmosphere. Nikilitha approaches challenges with ingenuity. She thinks outside the box, propose innovative solutions, and adapt well to unexpected situations. Her creativity adds value to the team. Nikilitha's passion for web development shines through in her work.

testimonials.name: Candice Keet
testimonials.message: Nikilitha is one of the most hard-working people around. She just spreads joy wherever she is and is always looking for ways to improve her coding skills. Nikilitha has helped me grow so much,she has a way of just spreading positivity wherever she is.Her personality is the best reflection of how she treats herself, her work and as well as the people around her. Having her in your team will guarantee you nothing but success.
